p: These results corroborate with the study by Formiga et al[ 52] with the ethanolic extract of Maytenus erythroxylon Reissek, which has triterpenes in its composition, the administration of the extract associated with propranolol, L-NAME or glibenclamide reduced its antimotility effect, suggesting the participation of adrenergic and nitrergic pathways and K ATP channels in their effect.
